snippet: The critic Dwight Garner recalls the flickering moments he’s been unable to shake: killing jokes and stolen kisses and fleeting glimpses; scenes and ideas and sleights of hand.
abstract: Dwight Garner Critic's Notebook highlights his favorite books of 2015.
lead_paragraph: The critic Dwight Garner recalls the flickering moments he’s been unable to shake: killing jokes and stolen kisses and fleeting glimpses; scenes and ideas and sleights of hand.

headline.main: Reading Is About the Lines That Leap Off the Pages
headline.print_headline: The Joy in the Lines That Leap Off the Pages
